name: Multi Aggregator (Real-Debrid Optimized)
description: Aggregates multiple quality torrent providers (optimized for Real-Debrid). Priority: SeaDex > AnimeTosho > AniLiberty > Nyaa > ACG.RIP > RuTracker. Prioritizes InfoHash/Magnet links, clean metadata, and deduplication.
author: Vv4j

fields.name: enableAnimeTosho
fields.label: Enable AnimeTosho (high quality, good magnet availability)

fields.name: enableNyaa
fields.label: Enable Nyaa (broad coverage, may require scraping)

fields.name: enableRuTracker
fields.label: Enable RuTracker via TorAPI (Russian tracker, lowest priority)

fields.name: autoScrapeMagnets
fields.label: Auto-scrape magnet links from pages (for RD compatibility)

fields.name: magnetScrapeLimit
fields.label: Max torrent pages to scrape per search (higher = slower but more complete)
